sentences.en: “Happiness is an emotion not often spoken of at the magazine, much less experienced”(&b{Brendan Gill})
sentences.cn: “幸福不是经常在杂志上提到的感情，更不用说是能够时常体验得到的”(&b{布伦丹·吉尔})

sentences.en: Basal metabolism is much lower for creatures in cold water.
sentences.cn: 冷水中生物的基础代谢速度要低很多。

sentences.en: Don'tspill too much fat on the barbecue as it could flare up.
sentences.cn: 不要在烤肉上浇太多的油，会烧起来的。

sentences.en: Experts reveal only as much as they care to.
sentences.cn: 专家们只透露了他们想透露的那些。

sentences.en: He arrived on January 9, disheveled and much the worse for wear.
sentences.cn: 他是1月9号到的，蓬头垢面，疲惫不堪。

sentences.en: He does deserve some good luck after so much wretchedness.
sentences.cn: 经过这么多苦难之后，他应该行点好运了。

sentences.en: He drank too much and is paying dearly for it.
sentences.cn: 他现在正为酗酒付出沉重的代价。

sentences.en: Henry’s room is much bigger than mine.
sentences.cn: 亨利的房间比我的大得多。

sentences.en: his earnestness can be a bit much.
sentences.cn: 可能他认真得有点儿过头了。

sentences.en: I am sure she would do as much for me.
sentences.cn: 我确信她同样会为我做这些事的。

sentences.en: I didn't know Ron had that much strength of character.
sentences.cn: 我当时不知道罗恩有那么坚强的个性。

sentences.en: I don’t have much money with me.
sentences.cn: 我身上没带很多钱。

sentences.en: I enjoy pleasure as much as the next person.
sentences.cn: 我和别人一样愉快。

sentences.en: I know this much, you would defy the world to get what you wanted.
sentences.cn: 这一点我清楚，你会反抗整个世界以取得你想要的东西。

sentences.en: If he demands too much, the unions will vote him down.
sentences.cn: 如果他要求太多，工会就会投票撤换他。

sentences.en: If you [he] had much money, you [he] should buy it.
sentences.cn: 如果你[他]有许多钱， 你[他]就该把它买下来。

sentences.en: much as I had enjoyed my adventure it was good to be back.
sentences.cn: 虽然这番游历使我很开心，能回来也真好。

sentences.en: People usually complain about having to deal with too much bureaucracy.
sentences.cn: 人们经常抱怨不得不应付太多的繁文缛节。

sentences.en: Softer fabrics are much more becoming than stiffer ones.
sentences.cn: 软面料要比硬面料合身得多。

sentences.en: Sonia, we are reliably informed, loves her family very much.
sentences.cn: 我们从可靠的消息来源获知索尼娅非常爱自己的家人。

sentences.en: The attitude of the medical profession is very much more liberal now.
sentences.cn: 现在，医务人员的态度开明多了。

sentences.en: The day ended much as it began.
sentences.cn: 这一天结束时还像开始时一样。

sentences.en: the effort proved too much for her.
sentences.cn: 尝试的结果证明此事她无法应付。

sentences.en: Then you can have much in common with them.
sentences.cn: 然后你可以与他们有许多共同之处。

sentences.en: There was not much elbow room in the cockpit of a Snipe.
sentences.cn: “沙锥鸟”战斗机的驾驶舱空间不太宽敞。

sentences.en: we want to hear your say, but if you make it short, so much the better.
sentences.cn: 我们想听听你的意见，不过你要是能说得简短一点那就更好了。

sentences.en: Well, so much for the producers. But what of the con-sumers?
sentences.cn: 好吧，关于生产商就讲这么多，那关于消费者呢？

phrases.tran_cn: 虽然，尽管（表让步）；非常像， 和…几乎一样
这么；非常；达到这种程度
到此为止，仅仅就这么多；有关…，就只有这些
这一点（指下面就要说出的事实）
令人无法忍受的事情；无法（或难以）对付的事情；令人精疲力竭的事情

trans.tran_cn: 非常，差不多，很多地，很大程度上
很多，大量，很好的东西，（与不可数名词连用，尤用于否定句，或与 how 连用以询问数量，也可与 as、so 和 too 连用）许多
